page.title: 19EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES
page.content: It is realised that{education}is not confined to the school day but{extra {curricular activities}often depends on {parental support}and the{willingness {of the staff}in terms of time and money. {'Clubs'}take place after school hours which include{sports activities such as{gym, football,}and{netball; {music activities}such as{brass band; also{drama}and{environmental clubs. {Outdoor Education Centres}may be {residential}and are well used for learning about the{environment in {situ. {Day trips}are used to reinforce {topic work}done in the classroom. {Annual holidays}combine{social}and {educational learning.}The{Isle of {Wight}being a popular venue for our school.
